entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
